q: '' said Mike Pence in a speech on the House floor.`` It would ensure that abortion providers are not subsidized with federal tax dollars.''`` Now, let me say,'' Mike Pence continued, to be very clear, Mr. Speaker, this legislation does not cut one penny from title X family planning funding. I applaud much of the important work that is done at title X clinics across this country: breast cancer screening, HIV protection, education, counseling, pregnancy diagnosis. This legislation simply prevents family planning funding from aiding organizations that profit from the abortion industry.
